name: Route
description: Build a road to connect your capital to our city.

name: Clear Barbarian Camp
description: We feel threatened by a Zombie Horde near our city. Please take care of it.

name: Connect Resource
description: In order to make our friendship stronger, connect [tileResource] to your trade network, we havent had those for a long while

name: Construct Wonder
description: We recommend you to start building [wonder]. For the sake of our survival.

name: Acquire Great Person
description: Do you have a [greatPerson]? I hope this guy havent turned into zombie yet.

name: Conquer City State
description: It's time to erase the City-State of [cityState] from the map. They definitely lead a horde into one of our camp.

name: Find Player
description: You have yet to discover where [civName] set up their cities. You will be rewarded for finding their territories.

name: Find Natural Wonder
description: Send your best explorers on a quest to discover pre-apocalypse wonder. Nobody knows the location of [naturalWonder] yet.

name: Give Gold
description: We are suffering great poverty after being robbed by [civName], and unless we receive at least some sustainance, it's only a matter of time before we collapse.

name: Pledge to Protect
description: We need your protection to stop the aggressions of [civName]. By signing a Pledge of Protection, you'll confirm the bond that ties us.

name: Contest Culture
description: Lets see whose ideal can recover the hope of our state.

name: Contest Faith
description: Lets see whose ideal can recover the hope of our state.

name: Contest Technologies
description: If only things could return to the past...

name: Invest
description: Our people are rejoicing thanks to a festival. For a certain amount of time, any Gold donation will yield [50]% extra Influence.

name: Bully City State
description: We are tired of the pretensions of [cityState]. If someone were to put them in their place by Demanding Tribute from them, they would be rewarded.

name: Denounce Civilization
description: We have been forced to pay tribute to [civName]! We need you to tell the world of their ill deeds.

name: Spread Religion
description: We have heard the tenets of [religionName] and are most curious. Will you send missionaries to teach us about your religion?
